channel.title: Comments on: Getting ready for Thursday

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I'll admit it is fun, but don't you find that shooting fish in barrels can be a bit boring?</p><p>Much better to completely blow them away by developing an application which would take months in .Net (or J2EE for that matter) in a couple of weeks, and not only that do it better than other platforms could.</p><p>In my experience, whenever I've been put into competition with .Net to produce the same application we've always won. There's no need to get personal or defensive about it.</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
I’ll admit it is fun, but don’t you find that shooting fish in barrels can be a bit boring?

Much better to completely blow them away by developing an application which would take months in .Net (or J2EE for that matter) in a couple of weeks, and not only that do it better than other platforms could.

In my experience, whenever I’ve been put into competition with .Net to produce the same application we’ve always won. There’s no need to get personal or defensive about it.

Matt

item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>Your wrong! Its best to....</p><p><img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>></p><p>Yeah.</p><p>However, in my defence, m'Lord, arent you sick and tired of the MS weenies lying about Notes all the time. Now and then I like to rampage all over them, just for kicks.. </p><p>---* Bill</p>
item.content:encoded:
